trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Sistema do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Sistema do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: This topic lists the system requirements for [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], and for special features, such as [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)], CIM commands, and workflows.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico lista os requisitos de sistema para o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)], bem como para recursos especiais, como o [!INCLUDE[mshgraphicalhost](../Token/mshgraphicalhost_md.md)], comandos CIM e fluxos de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_1](../Token/winblue_client_1_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)] include all required programs.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_1](../Token/winblue_client_1_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_1](../Token/winblue_server_1_md.md)] incluem todos os programas necessários.

trans-unit.source: This topic is designed for users of earlier releases of Windows.
trans-unit.target: Este tópico foi criado para usuários de versões anteriores do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Operating System Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos de sistema operacional

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] executa nas seguintes versões do Windows.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) para executar o [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 4.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=293881) para executar o [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] runs on the following versions of Windows.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] executa nas seguintes versões do Windows.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], installed by default
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], instalado por padrão

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_client_firstref](../Token/win7_client_firstref_md.md)] com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para executar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] with Service Pack 1, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win7_server_firstref](../Token/win7_server_firstref_md.md)] com Service Pack 1, instale o [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para executar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] with Service Pack 2, install [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) to run [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[lserver](../Token/lserver_md.md)] com Service Pack 2, instale o [Windows Management Framework 3.0](http://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=34595) para executar o [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)]

trans-unit.source: Microsoft .NET Framework Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Microsoft .NET Framework

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requer a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] incluem o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 por padrão.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] requires the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] requer a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] include Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 by default, which fulfills this requirement.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)] incluem o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 por padrão, que atende a esse requisito.

trans-unit.source: To install Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Para instalar o Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5 (dotNetFx45_Full_setup.exe) consulte [Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=242919) no Centro de Download da Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: To install the full installation of Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40\_Full\_setup.exe), see [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Web Installer)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) on the Microsoft Download Center.
trans-unit.target: Para instalar a instalação completa do Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (dotNetFx40_Full_setup.exe) consulte [Microsoft .NET Framework 4 (Instalador da Web)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212931) no Centro de Download da Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: WS\-Management 3.0
trans-unit.target: WS-Management 3.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] require WS\-Management 3.0, which supports the WinRM service and WSMan protocol.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requerem o WS-Management 3.0, que dá suporte ao serviço WinRM e o protocolo WSMan.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0, and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Este programa está incluído em [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0 e [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0
trans-unit.target: Instrumentação de Gerenciamento do Windows 3.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] require Windows Management Instrumentation 3.0 (WMI).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] requerem o WMI (Instrumentação de Gerenciamento do Windows) 3.0.

trans-unit.source: This program is included in [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0, and [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Este programa está incluído em [!INCLUDE[winblue_client_2](../Token/winblue_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_client_2](../Token/win8_client_2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)], Windows Management Framework 4.0 e [!INCLUDE[ps_wmf_3.0](../Token/ps_wmf_3.0_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: If this program is not installed on the computer, features that require WMI, such as CIM commands, do not run.
trans-unit.target: Se este programa não estiver instalado no computador, os recursos que exigem o WMI, como comandos CIM, não serão executados.

trans-unit.source: Common Language Runtime 4.0
trans-unit.target: Common Language Runtime 4.0

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] are compiled against Common Language Runtime (CLR) 4.0.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] são compilados em CLR (Common Language Runtime) 4.0.

trans-unit.source: Graphical User Interface Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos da interface gráfica do usuário

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] is a console\-based application that does not require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] é um aplicativo baseado em console que não requer uma interface do usuário gráfica.

trans-unit.source: As such, is it well suited to computers that do not have screens or monitors, or a user interface, such as the Server Core installation options of [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Como tal, é ele adequado para computadores que não têm telas, monitores ou uma interface do usuário, como as opções de instalação Server Core do [!INCLUDE[winblue_server_2](../Token/winblue_server_2_md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[win8_server_2](../Token/win8_server_2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, some items, such as the following, require a graphical user interface.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, alguns itens, como os seguintes, exigem uma interface do usuário gráfica.

trans-unit.source: For details, see the help topic for each item.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais detalhes, consulte o tópico de ajuda para cada item.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets

trans-unit.source: Out-GridView
trans-unit.target: Out-GridView

trans-unit.source: Show-Command
trans-unit.target: Show-Command

trans-unit.source: Show-ControlPanelItem
trans-unit.target: Show-ControlPanelItem

trans-unit.source: Show-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Show-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Parameters
trans-unit.target: Parâmetros

trans-unit.source: **ShowWindow** parameter of the [Get-Help](assetId:///1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: Parâmetro **ShowWindow** do cmdlet [Get-Help](assetId:///1f46eeb4-49d7-4bec-bb29-395d9b42f54a).

trans-unit.source: **ShowSecurityDescriptorUi** parameter of the [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](assetId:///e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) and [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](assetId:///b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea) cmdlets.
trans-unit.target: Parâmetro **ShowSecurityDescriptorUi** dos cmdlets [Register-PSSessionConfiguration](assetId:///e9152ae2-bd6d-4056-9bc7-dc1893aa29ea) e [Set-PSSessionConfiguration](assetId:///b21fbad3-1759-4260-b206-dcb8431cd6ea).

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Engine Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requisitos do Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] is designed to be backwards compatible with [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] é projetado para ser compatível com versões anteriores do [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Cmdlets, providers, snap\-ins, modules, and scripts written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] run unchanged in [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets, provedores, snap-ins, módulos e scripts desenvolvidos para o [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] são executados sem alterações no [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: However, due to a change in the runtime activation policy in Microsoft .NET Framework 4, [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] host programs that were written for [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] and compiled with Common Language Runtime (CLR) 2.0 cannot run without modification in [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], which is compiled with CLR 4.0.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, devido a uma alteração na política de ativação do tempo de execução no Microsoft .NET Framework 4, programas de host do [!INCLUDE[wps_2](../Token/wps_2_md.md)] que foram desenvolvidos para [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] e compilados com o CLR (Common Language Runtime) 2.0 não podem ser executado sem modificação no [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], que é compilado com o CLR 4.0.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine requires Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 at a minimum.
trans-unit.target: O Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] requer o Microsoft .NET Framework 2.0.50727 no mínimo.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.
trans-unit.target: Esse requisito é atendido pelo Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1.

trans-unit.source: This requirement is not fulfilled by Microsoft .NET Framework 4 and later releases of Microsoft .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Esse requisito não é atendido pelo Microsoft .NET Framework 4 e versões posteriores do Microsoft .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For information about adding or installing the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine, and adding or installing the required versions of the Microsoft .NET Framework, see [Installing the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como adicionar ou instalar o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] e adicionar ou instalar as versões necessárias do Microsoft .NET Framework, consulte [Instalar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Installing-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about starting the [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)] engine, see [Starting the Windows PowerShell 2.0 Engine](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como iniciar o Mecanismo do [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], consulte [Iniciar o Mecanismo do Windows PowerShell 2.0](../Topic/Starting-the-Windows-PowerShell-2.0-Engine.md).

trans-unit.source: Windows Preinstallation Environment
trans-unit.target: Ambiente de Pré-instalação do Windows

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] run in the Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[psversion2](../Token/psversion2_md.md)], [!INCLUDE[psversion3](../Token/psversion3_md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[psversion4](../Token/psversion4_md.md)] são executados no Windows PE (Ambiente de Pré-Instalação do Windows).

trans-unit.source: However, the following cmdlets are not supported.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, não há suporte para os seguintes cmdlets.

trans-unit.source: Background Intelligent Transfer Service (BITS) Cmdlets
trans-unit.target: Cmdlets do BITS (Serviço de Transferência Inteligente em Segundo Plano)

trans-unit.source: Get-EventLog
trans-unit.target: Get-EventLog

trans-unit.source: Get-WinEvent[PSITPro5_Diagnostic]
trans-unit.target: Get-WinEvent[PSITPro5_Diagnostic]

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: Update-Help
trans-unit.target: Update-Help

trans-unit.source: Also, the **WinRm** service is not present on Windows PE.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o serviço do **WinRm** não está presente no Windows PE.

trans-unit.target: Consulte Também
